senses.sense_definition: A stanza or section of a poem consisting of four lines.

examples.text: The first <w>quatrain</w> of the sonnet establishes the main theme.
She analyzed the rhyme scheme used in the final <w>quatrain</w>.

senses.sense_definition: A complete poem consisting of only four lines.

examples.text: He wrote a witty <w>quatrain</w> on the back of a napkin.
The anthology features a famous <w>quatrain</w> about the changing seasons.
